issue.title: [CF 636] Request: Font Flag - Shadow
issue.body:
"No outline" is hard to see and outline doesn't match my UI.  Can you please add a "Shadow" font flag option?  Thank you.


> Posted by CurseForge user Adapted | Imported from CurseForge issue #636 | Raw

comments.body:
Done in r714. Sorry it took so long.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
